docs.summary: The Bookings Custom Pricing Service Plugin.
description: The Custom Pricing service plugin (formerly SPI) is a service provider interface that allows site owners and collaborators to add custom pricing
to bookings on their site. The custom pricing is calculated and used as the basis for the price
when checking out the booking, overriding the standard Bookings pricing logic. Examples of custom pricing include surcharges for weekend rates or use of special equipment.
Wix Bookings calls the [`calculatePrice()`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-bookings-v2/service-plugins-spis/bookings-custom-pricing/calculate-price)
Velo service plugin function to retrieve the relevant data for a site collaborator to customize the price.
Site collaborators can then implement their own logic to calculate and return the price.
Note that the `currency` used by `calculatePrice()`
is your site's currency. You can find the currency of your site using the [`getPaymentCurrency()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-site-backend/generalinfo-obj/getpaymentcurrency)
function.
Learn more:
+ [Bookings Custom Pricing service plugin](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-tutorial-bookings-pricing-custom-extension)
+ [Velo: Custom App Extensions Using service plugins](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-custom-business-app-extensions-using-spis-beta)
### To add a service plugin

1. [Add the plugin to your site](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/coding-with-velo/integrations/custom-extensions-spis/custom-app-extensions-using-sp-is#step-1-create-a-new-extension-on-your-wix-site).
2. Update the [`getConfig()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/spis/wix-bookings/bookings-custom-pricing/getconfig) function in the **-config.js** file that is added to your site during step 1.
3. Update the [`calculatePrice()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/spis/wix-bookings/bookings-custom-pricing/calculateprice) function in the **.js** file that is added to your site during step 1.

params.name: options
params.doc: Options for calculating the price, including the actual booking.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The calculated price for the booking.

docs.summary: Calculates the price of a booking to include during checkout. The calculated price is based on custom business logic.
description: The `calculatePrice()` function calculates custom pricing for use on the checkout pages of a merchant's site.
The function is automatically called by Wix when the booking is being checked out for payment.
### Where to find `calculatePrice()`

When you [add the Custom Pricing plugin](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/code-tutorials/wix-bookings/tutorial-bookings-pricing-custom-extension#step-1-create-a-bookings-pricing-extension),
a folder is automatically added to your site. Use the `<my-plugin-name>.js` file in the folder to write the code to calculate the price for the booking.

For more information on customizing your price calculation, see [Tutorial: Bookings Pricing Custom Extension](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/code-tutorials/wix-bookings/tutorial-bookings-pricing-custom-extension#js).

examples.title: Calculate a custom price for a booking
body: // Import "coded-elsewhere" functionality for retrieving special rates
// The calculatePrice service plugin runs at checkout to calculate the final price
// Retrieve the charge for each given `additionalField` for the booking.

extra.description: This example calculates the custom price for booking a massage using cheaper rates for weekdays and with additional options.

docs.summary: Retrieves the configuration of your custom pricing plugin.
description: Set your custom pricing configuration in the `return` of the `getConfig()` function. Wix calls this function when you publish your site.
Changes to the configuration don't take effect until you publish your site.
### Where to find `getConfig()`

When you [add the Custom Pricing plugin](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/code-tutorials/wix-bookings/tutorial-bookings-pricing-custom-extension#step-1-create-a-bookings-pricing-extension),
a folder is automatically added to your site. Use the `<my-plugin-name>-config.js` file in the folder to set the default configuration for your
implementation of the plugin.

For more information on setting your configuration, see [Tutorial: Bookings Pricing Custom Extension](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/code-tutorials/wix-bookings/tutorial-bookings-pricing-custom-extension#-configjs).

examples.title: Example of a configuration file
body: // Place this code in the <my-extension-name>-config.js file
// Custom Extensions section on your site.

description: Coordinates of the physical address.

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Booked resource ID.

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Resource's name at the time of booking.

description: An object describing the slot or schedule that was booked.

members.name: slot
members.doc: The booked slot, once booked becomes a session, The booking is automatically assigned to the session if it already exists, or creates a session if one doesn't already exist.

members.name: schedule
members.doc: The booked schedule. The booking is automatically assigned to the schedule's sessions.

members.name: title
members.doc: Session title at the time of booking.

members.name: tags
members.doc:
List of tags for the booking.
System-assigned tags for sessions and schedules are:

+ `"INDIVIDUAL"` Appointments, including appointments with more than 1 participant.
+ `"GROUP"` Individual classes.
+ `"COURSE"` Courses.

description: The booking to calculate the price of.

members.name: namespace
members.doc:
An object containing data extension extended fields in `key:value` pairs. 
+ `key`: Namespace.
+ `value`: Extended fields data in `Struct` format.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was created.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was updated.

members.name: additionalFields
members.doc: Additional custom fields submitted with the booking form.

members.name: bookedEntity
members.doc: An object describing the slot or schedule that was booked.

members.name: contactDetails
members.doc: Contact details of the site visitor or member making the booking.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: The start date of this booking in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.  For a slot, this is the start date of the slot. For a schedule, this is the start date of the first session.

members.name: endDate
members.doc: The end date of this booking in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.  For a slot, this is the end date of the slot. For a schedule, this is the end date of the last session.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: ID of the creator of the booking. If `appId` and another ID are present, the other ID takes precedence.

members.name: doubleBooked
members.doc: Whether this booking overlaps another existing confirmed booking.

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc: Additional custom fields. This includes fields managed by Wix, by 3rd-party apps, and by the site.

members.name: externalUserId
members.doc: External ID provided by the client app on creation.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Payment status. One of: 
+ `"NOT_PAID"` The booking is not paid for.
+ `"PAID"` The booking is fully paid.
+ `"PARTIALLY_PAID"` The booking is partially paid.
+ `"REFUNDED"` The booking is refunded.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number to be used when updating, rescheduling, or cancelling the booking. Revision number, which increments by 1 each time the booking is updated, rescheduled, or canceled. To prevent conflicting changes,the current revision must be passed when updating the booking.

members.name: selectedPaymentOption
members.doc: Selected payment option. One of the payment options offered by the service, or another option if `skipSelectedPaymentOptionValidation` is `true`. When undefined, the payment option is resolved by the service configuration on checkout.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Booking status. One of:
+ `"CREATED"`. A potential booking was created but not yet confirmed.
+ `"UPDATED"`. The booking was updated.
+ `"CONFIRMED"`. The booking has been confirmed and appears on the calendar.
+ `"CANCELED"`. The booking has been canceled and the cancelation is synced to the calendar.
+ `"PENDING"`. The booking is waiting to be confirmed or declined by the owner. In the meantime, th booking is synced to the calendar.
+ `"WAITING_LIST"`. The booking is on a waiting list.
+ `"DECLINED"`. The booking was declined by the owner and the decline is synced to the calendar.

members.name: totalParticipants
members.doc: Total number of participants. Available only when the booking includes a single service variant.

members.name: participantsChoices
members.doc: Information about the booked service choices and participants. Available only when the booking includes multiple service variants.

members.name: calculatedPrice
members.doc:
The price for the booking according to your custom logic.

The `calculatedPrice()` function's response is based on your site's currency.

description: ID of the creator of the booking. If `appId` and another ID are present, the other ID takes precedence.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of of a contact in the site's CRM system.

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

description: Contact details of the site visitor or member making the booking.

members.name: contactID
members.doc: Contact's ID.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Contact's first name. When populated from a standard booking form, this property corresponds to the `Name` field.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Contact's last name.

members.name: email
members.doc: Contact's email, used to create a new contact or get existing one from the [Contacts API](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-crm-frontend). Used to validate coupon usage limitations per contact. If not passed, the coupon usage limitation will not be enforced. (Coupon usage limitation validation is not supported yet).

members.name: phone
members.doc: Contact's phone number.

members.name: fullAddress
members.doc: Contact's full address.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Contact's country in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: currency
members.doc: [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) 3-letter currency code representing the currency used in the request sent from Wix. The response should be returned in the same currency.

members.name: identity
members.doc: The identity that describes the identity that triggered this request.

members.name: languages
members.doc: An array of languages in which the response should be returned. Languages are strings in concatenated [ISO 639-1: 2 Alpha language-code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639_language_codes) and [ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha country-code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) format, such as "en-US".

members.name: requestId
members.doc: A unique identifier of the request. You may print this ID to your logs to help with future debugging and easier correlation with Wix's logs.

description: Additional custom field submitted with the booking form.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the form field as defined in the form.

members.name: label
members.doc: Form field's label at the time of submission.

members.name: value
members.doc: Value that was submitted for this field.

members.name: valueType
members.doc:
One of: 
+ `"SHORT_TEXT"`
+ `"LONG_TEXT"`
+ `"CHECK_BOX"`

members.name: pricingProviderName
members.doc: The name of the main service plugin function.

description: Additional custom fields. This includes fields managed by Wix, by 3rd-party apps, and by the site.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of of a contact in the site's CRM system.

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

description: Contact's full address.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: Contact's country code in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: countryFullname
members.doc: Country full name.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: Contact's phone number.

members.name: geocode
members.doc: Coordinates of the physical address.

members.name: hint
members.doc: Free text to help find the address.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Zip/postal code.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: subdivisions
members.doc: Multi-level subdivisions from top to bottom.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Type of identity that triggered the request. Possible values are:
+ `UNKNOWN`
+ `ANONYMOUS_VISITOR`
+ `MEMBER`
+ `WIX_USER`
+ `APP`

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor who has not logged in to the site. Only provided if `identityType` is `ANONYMOUS_VISITOR`.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor who has logged in to the site. Only provided if `identityType` is `MEMBER`.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.). Only provided if `identityType` is `WIX_USER`.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app. Only provided if `identityType` is `APP`.

description: Location where the slot's session takes place.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Business location ID. Available only for locations that are business locations, meaning the location_type is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location name.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: The full address of this location.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Resource's schedule ID.Supported values: `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`, `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`, `"CUSTOM"`.
Location type.
+ `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`: The business address, as set in the site’s general settings.
+ `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`: The address as set when creating the service.
+ `"CUSTOM"`: The address as set for the individual session.

description: Options needed to calculate the price of the booking, including the booking itself.

members.name: booking
members.doc: Booking to calculate custom pricing for.

description: Information about the booked service choices and participants. Available only when the booking includes multiple service variants.

members.name: serviceChoices
members.doc: Information about the booked service's choices. Includes the number of participants.

description: The resource assigned to the slot.

members.name: id
members.doc: Booked resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource's name at the time of booking.

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource's email at the time of booking.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Resource's schedule ID.

description: The booked schedule. The booking is automatically assigned to the schedule's sessions.

members.name: id
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: firstSession
members.doc: The start time of the first session in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

members.name: lastSession
members.doc: The end time of the last session in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

members.name: location
members.doc: Location where the schedule's sessions take place.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Booked service ID.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

description: Service choices for these participants.

members.name: optionId
members.doc: ID of the corresponding option for the choice. For example, the choice `child` could correspond to the option `ageGroup`. In this case, `optionId` is the ID for the `ageGroup` option.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Value for one of the choices in the CustomServiceOption.choices list. Choices are specific values for an option the customer can choose to book. For example, the option `ageGroup` may have these choices: `child`, `student`, `adult`, and `senior`. Each choice may have a different price.

description: Information about the booked service's choices. Includes the number of participants.

members.name: choices
members.doc: Service choice for participants.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Number of participants for this variant.

description: The booked slot, once booked becomes a session, The booking is automatically assigned to the session if it already exists, or creates a session if one doesn't already exist.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc: ID of the underlying session when session is a single session or generated from a recurring session. If sessionId is defined in the Create Booking request, the startDate, endDate, timezone, resource, and location fields are ignored and populated from the existing session's information.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: The start time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

members.name: endDate
members.doc: The end time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: The date the booking was last updated.

members.name: resource
members.doc: The resource assigned to the slot.

members.name: location
members.doc: Location where the slot's session takes place.

description: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: apt
members.doc: Apartment number.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

description: Subdivision. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: code
members.doc: Subdivision code. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: name
members.doc: Subdivision full name.

description: Multi-level subdivisions from top to bottom.

members.name: code
members.doc: Subdivision code. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).
